mode.help: can be: growseason, specificmoment, monthly or hourly

geometryFile.help: path to a wavefront (.obj) file with the geometry

geometryRotation.help: The rotation of the geometry file (x-axis) with respect to north on the map (counterclockwise)

regionO.help: origin of the region that is considered for shadow computation

regionV1.help: first vertex indicating one of the corners of the (rectangular) region

regionV2.help: vertex indicating the second corner of the region such that V2-O is perpendicular to V1-O

stepsV1.help: number of steps in V1 direction

stepsV2.help: number of steps in V2 direction

date.help: Change what is necessary, e.g. only year is relevant for growseason
